messages.message: Heads up, we found an instance of the changes to event delegation in React 17 (https://legacy.reactjs.org/blog/2020/08/10/react-v17-rc.html#changes-to-event-delegation) causing a bug - the dropzone component wasn't going away on dragleave, and we use this component in a lot of places, including AI Hub. I'll be checking all the components that use `e.stopPropagation` in AI Hub tomorrow, and then trying to go through the platform ones before the 24.04 release. Keep an eye out for this!! @Liam Callanan, might be good to manually check any Pollen components using this too.

Also:
• This only matters where these are handlers being attached to the document
• The fix is to add `{ capture: true }` when you attach them
